topics.body:
"@Whatevs":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/544037ce6368724adb1d0100#post_544037ce6368724adb1d0100
"@QuasarNova":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54403b0d636872064eb80000#post_54403b0d636872064eb80000
We were working on Hyperbolas and two of my students wrote it on the board. What I didn't notice was that they made like machine gun turrets, tanks, aircraft carriers, and all sorts of war stuff, probably to show their superiority on writing equations. After a while, I decided to get in on it while they are arguing about using disease warfare and headquarters by writing my own problem. I added a satellite full of kinetic weapons. Then they try to fight me. It all ended with the Sun getting pulled into the earth and one escaped on mars, another on a spaceship, and me traveling back in time.
